TextView.android:text: 1 Pull Up
x5-7 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
3 Pull Ups (r) ---> 10 Pull Ups (g)
x3 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
5 Dips (On the last rep, hold at the top, middle and bottom positions for 10 seconds each).
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
20 Push Ups
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 10kg Squats ---> 10x 10kg Jumping Lunges (E/S)
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 10kg Lunges (E/S) ---> 12 Lunges (E/S)
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
15x 5kg Sit Ups ---> 10x 5kg Roman Twists ---> 1 min Plank with 5kg
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Max Floor Leg Raises in a minute ---> Max Bar Knee Raises in a minute
x5 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups (r) ---> 15 Wide Push Ups
x5 Sets (2-3 min rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
1 Chin Up ---> 3 Chin Ups (r)
x5 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
3 Chin Ups (b) + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold ---> 4 Chin Ups (p) + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold ---> 6 Chin Ups (g) + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold
x3 Sets (2 to 3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Dips + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold ---> 15 Push Ups
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max DeadHang Hold
x5 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
20x 10kg Squats ---> 30 seconds Wall Sit with 10kg
x4-5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 10kg Bulgarian Split Squat (E/S) ---> 15x 10kg Lunges (E/S)
x4-5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
30 Broad Jumps ---> 30 Calf Raises
x3 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Optional: Max Wide Push Ups (6-8 sets, 90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Beginner Program Level 2 - Week 3
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
If majority of the pull up sets were broken, then it's worth considering to repeat this weekly routine before moving onto Week 4.
